modShortDescription: Automatic shotgun ROF increase. Makes the automatic shotgun much more fun.
modDescription:
Automatic shotgun ROF increase. Makes the automatic [shotgun](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) much more fun.

**[Download](https://github.com/GopherMods/7DTDMods/raw/master/AutoShotgunGoneWild.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21157-gophers-modlets-now-compatible-with-alpha-19/).

**Credits:** [Gopher](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/gopher/)
